item.title: About
item.author: blog@pietromaggi.com (Pietro F. Maggi)
item.description: Hi! My name is Pietro F. Maggi. I’m a Father an Husband and occasionally I find the time to write some code. I really believe that the best way to learn how something works is to take it apart (I know, I can’t really blame my kids when they do the same). I’ve more than fifteen years designing and developing software solutions with a deep mobile experience. I sometimes speak at conferences to talk about the Android ecosystem and developer tools with a particular attention to enterprise mobility.

item.title: Slide Decks
item.author: blog@pietromaggi.com (Pietro F. Maggi)
item.description: Android Wireless DeepDive Exploring how to build a RhoMobile native extension for an Android undocumented feature. Mobile Barcode Scanning API Status An analysis of barcode scanning API status on mobile devices.
